explains: n. （书、剧本或电影等的）概要，摘要，梗概；提要，概要

sentences.en: For each title there is a brief synopsis of the book.
sentences.cn: 每本书都附有一个该书的简短提要。

sentences.en: Provide a synopsis of their written submission.
sentences.cn: 提交一份其书面材料的大纲。

sentences.en: Here is a brief synopsis of my main argument.
sentences.cn: 下文是笔者主要观点的概述。
